Info.Title: Carrie
Info.Writer: Lawrence D. Cohen (screenplay), Roberto Aguirre-Sacasa (screenplay), Stephen King (novel)
Info.Actors: Julianne Moore, ChloÃ« Grace Moretz, Gabriella Wilde, Portia Doubleday
Info.Plot: A shy girl, outcasted by her peers and sheltered by her religious mother, unleashes telekinetic terror on her small town after being pushed too far at her senior prom.
